channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024101101
item.description:
Report X-2024101101

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T06:17:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-10
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.
